attributes.action: Fight to reopen the maternity unit at Wycombe General Hospital
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The maternity unit at Wycombe General Hospital, Buckinghamshire has been shut including the SCBU unit, against the wishes of the majority of local residents, the closest maternity unit is now in Stoke Mandeville, a 20 mile drive away! A town as big as High Wycombe needs its own Maternity Unit, it is unacceptable to expect women in labour to travel so far needlessly.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to fight to reopen the maternity unit at Wycombe General Hospital.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=wghmaternityunit



Her Majesty's Government
